title: Blended Social Education Course Design Using the Trialogic Learning Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Educational Theories and Understanding of Social Studies Curriculum Content
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment is provided for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen social studies competencies, integrating online (theory) and offline (practice/simulation) components.

learning_goals: Learners enhance collaborative knowledge-building skills in real-world social problem-solving simulations by applying the Trialogic learning approach.
Learners apply core social studies concepts (e.g., democracy, conflict resolution) to real-life scenarios using VR-based educational tools.
Participants iteratively improve instructional design competencies by incorporating formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
